name: New Years Block Party
description:
A quick game made for Mini Jam 44. The theme is "New Year", which I kind of just forced onto this game. I think there could be something interesting here, but I'm far too lazy to create more levels for the game.

There are a few bugs, but it should be playable.

Music Credits:

"Glitterhater"
By Computer Music All-Stars
